channel.title: Connecting to a server with a Specific client
channel.description:
How can I make my server only connect with the Silab client, And make it for you CAN'T connect with the mopars client?
Sorry if this has been posted before.

item.title: Connecting to a server with a Specific client
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

That tutorial does nothing, even if the people who are using the moparscape client, they can click “Silab” and still continue playing on the server although they wouldn’t be able to use/see the new items. Stupid moparscapers.

Read full topic

item.title: Connecting to a server with a Specific client
item.dc:creator: @owner_Ethan owner Ethan
item.description:
@owner_Ethan wrote:

my server has that, it has a question like when u talk to a banker it asks - Are you using silabsofts client?-
YES
NO
if you click yes and you have silabs client you get to play
if you click yes and your using mopar you get dced
if you click no you get dced thats what mine does… not sure how to make it error connecting to server on mopar

Read full topic
